attributes.action: FREE PRESCRIPTIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH CYSTIC FIBROSIS
attributes.additional_details: It is time FREE prescriptions were available for all those living with the genetically inherited life-threatening chronic complex lung condition CYSTIC FIBROSIS.  Times are changing and people are now living longer with the help of new treatments and lot's of medication which is COSTLY to families already struggling.  CYSTIC FIBROSIS also affects the liver, kidneys, causes CF related diabetes, malnutrition, arthritis and digestive problems.
